speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: Prior to last year, where I attended my first meeting, it was going down -- the amount of money being spent by countries was going down and down very substantially.
politifact_statement: Prior to last year where I attended my first meeting, it was going down, the amount of money being spent by countries was going down and down very substantially, and now it's going up very substantially.
verified_claim: Since 2014, "each year, NATO nations have been increasing their contributions."
verified_claim_article_title: John Kerry rebuts Trump, says NATO spending was up, not down

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: And now, it's going up very substantially.
politifact_statement: Prior to last year where I attended my first meeting, it was going down, the amount of money being spent by countries was going down and down very substantially, and now it's going up very substantially.
verified_claim: Since 2014, "each year, NATO nations have been increasing their contributions."
verified_claim_article_title: John Kerry rebuts Trump, says NATO spending was up, not down

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: But the United States was paying for anywhere from 70 to 90 percent of it, depending on the way you calculate.
politifact_statement: I think NATO's a very important -- probably the greatest ever done. But the United States was paying for anywhere from 70 to 90 percent of it, depending on the way you calculate.
verified_claim: The United States was paying for anywhere from 70 to 90 percent of NATO, depending on the way you calculate.
verified_claim_article_title: Donald Trump misleads on US defense spending, NATO budge

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: And one state said -- you know, it was interesting, one of the states we won, Wisconsin -- I didn't even realize this until fairly recently -- that was the one state Ronald Reagan didn't win when he ran the board his second time.
politifact_statement: Wisconsin was "the one state that Ronald Reagan didn't win when he ran the board his second time. He didn't win Wisconsin, and we won Wisconsin."
verified_claim: Says Wisconsin "hadnt been won by a Republican since Dwight D. Eisenhower, in 1952. And I won Wisconsin.  Ronald Reagan, remember, Wisconsin was the state that Ronald Reagan did not win."
verified_claim_article_title: resident Trump makes some interesting claims about Wisconsin's Republican voting history  PolitiFact Wisconsin

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: I was not in favor of that war.
politifact_statement: On the Iraq War "I was not in favor of that war. I was very much against that war."
verified_claim: I was totally against the war in Iraq.
verified_claim_article_title: Trump repeats wrong claim that he opposed Iraq War
